mutants.mutated_line:
return f'Dear {recipient}{position}. I have had the pleasure of working with John for {length_of_time} and can attest to his {professional_achievements} and {personal_qualities}. John is a {work_ethic_and_leadership_abilities}.

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any further questions.

Sincerely,
{your_name}
{your_contact_info}'

return f'Dear {recipient},

I am writing to recommend John Smith for {position}. I have had the pleasure of working with John for {length_of_time} and can attest to his {professional_achievements} and {personal_qualities}. John is a {work_ethic_and_leadership_abilities}.

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any further questions.

Sincerely,
{your_name}{your_contact_info}'
